actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend titles IV and XVI of the Social Security Act to prohibit fugitive felons from receiving aid or assistance under the AFDC and SSI programs.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act and title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Act to make fugitive felons ineligible for AFDC and SSI.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles IV and XVI of the Social Security Act to prohibit fugitive felons from receiving aid or assistance under the AFDC and SSI programs.
